# VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointName

**Structure**

The joint names for a 3D body pose.

## Declaration

```swift
struct JointName
```

## Getting the Head Joint Names

- **topHead**: A joint name that represents the top of the head.
- **centerHead**: A joint name that represents the center of the head.

## Getting the Arm Joint Names

- **centerShoulder**: A joint name that represents the point between the shoulders.
- **leftShoulder**: A joint name that represents the left shoulder.
- **rightShoulder**: A joint name that represents the right shoulder.
- **leftElbow**: A joint name that represents the left elbow.
- **rightElbow**: A joint name that represents the right elbow.
- **leftWrist**: A joint name that represents the left wrist.
- **rightWrist**: A joint name that represents the right wrist.

## Getting the Leg Joint Names

- **leftHip**: A joint name that represents the left hip.
- **rightHip**: A joint name that represents the right hip.
- **leftKnee**: A joint name that represents the left knee.
- **rightKnee**: A joint name that represents the right knee.
- **leftAnkle**: A joint name that represents the left ankle.
- **rightAnkle**: A joint name that represents the right ankle.

## Getting the Root Joint Name

- **root**: A joint name that represents the point between the left hip and right hip.

## Getting the Spine

- **spine**: A joint name that represents the spine.

## Creating a Joint Name

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a joint name with the key you specify.

## 3D body pose detection

- **Identifying 3D human body poses in images**: Detect three-dimensional human body poses using the Vision framework.
- **Detecting human body poses in 3D with Vision**: Render skeletons of 3D body pose points in a scene overlaying the input image.
- **VNDetectHumanBodyPose3DRequest**: A request that detects points on human bodies in 3D space, relative to the camera.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation**: An observation that provides the 3D body points the request recognizes.
- **VNRecognizedPoints3DObservation**: An observation that provides the 3D points for a request.
- **VNHumanBodyRecognizedPoint3D**: A recognized 3D point that includes a parent joint.
- **VNPoint3D**: An object that represents a 3D point in an image.
- **VNRecognizedPoint3D**: A 3D point that includes an identifier to the point.
- **VNHumanBodyPose3DObservation.JointsGroupName**: The joint group names for a 3D body pose.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
